revised_title: Magnetic Disturbance of December 14, 1862 and Earth-Currents
tldr: The author investigates a magnetic disturbance that occurred on December 14, 1862, and its associated earth-currents. The study examines the relationship between magnetic disturbances and earth-currents, comparing the effects of different types of disturbances on the phenomenon. The results provide insights into the nature of magnetic disturbances and their connection with earth-currents.
